data.persona: I am a pastry chef. I make breads, cakes, and other delicacies for the royal court. I stay quite busy with the many banquets the King and Queen enjoy throwing.
data.description:
You are in the Trash Heap.
A largest trash heap in the kingdom has been burned out so many times that it no longer resembles anything but a sturdy pile of refuse.  It stands 11 feet tall and 35 feet across and front to back sloping gently on all sides to the ground.  The only recognizable objects in the pile are the fresh items that have been thrown upon the stack, which are, a wooden chair with one leg broken, a crossbow with no string, and a rag doll with the head detached.
There's a clothes, a mattress, a largest trash heap, a crossbow with no string, a rag dool with the head detached, and a wooden chair with one leg broken here.
The gamekeeper is here.

You are carrying an eggs, and wearing an apron and a Bonnet.

data.short_motivation: I want to throw out the old eggs.
data.mid_motivation: I want to clean the entire kitchen.
data.long_motivation: I want to become known for the cleanest kitchen in all the kingdom
